altername_name: Artlist Collection: The Dog Island: Hitotsu no Hana no Monogatari
name: Artlist Collection: The Dog Island
overview: Imagine that you're on an island full of dogs. In The Dog Island for Nintendo Wii, you play as a dog whose brother/sister falls ill one day. In order to help your brother/sister, you head to an island in search of a legendary flower. The game includes stages in grass planes, snowy fields and even deserts. You can also choose your dog from a variety of breeds. This is an adorable adventure for kids, based on the best-selling franchise 'THE DOG'.
